name: minimal_.js
description: Not a complex, configurable or complete build template system for underscore.js. minimal underscore -> min und -> minundy.js
author: gtzilla <gregory.tomlinson@gmail.com>

scripts.alert: terminal-notifier -sender com.googlecode.iterm2 -activate com.googlecode.iterm2 -group minimal_ -sound default -message "minimal_.js exited. Potential error." -title "Yarn Watch"
scripts.watch_alert: yarn watch --only-build &&  yarn watch || yarn alert
